meanings.sent1: The vivisectors in the lab carefully studied the frog's anatomy.
meanings.sent2: The vivisectors at the university are conducting important research on rats.
meanings.sent3: The vivisectors were so focused on their work that they accidentally tickled the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The vivisectors' precision in dissecting the fish was like that of skilled surgeons.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of the vivisectors working diligently stayed with the students long after class.

meanings.definition: Those who conduct experiments on living animals for scientific research.
meanings.sent1: The vivisectors' experiments on rabbits led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent2: Many vivisectors believe in the importance of ethical treatment of animals in research.
meanings.sent3: The vivisectors accidentally spilled their coffee on the lab rat during the experiment.
meanings.sent4: The vivisectors' dedication to their work was as strong as their commitment to animal welfare.
meanings.sent5: The vivid descriptions of the vivisectors' experiments left the audience in awe.
